body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LDRZ*VdxUTEct5AO3YomrOQI0CUIudKlNhXsP1EZ5jSIgURuXhOn6FMO77SXoiwTUxrx22o0BlUIRwf5F8kqjCZ5AfHOw4OT/file.JPG) Hi I have set up LB and HB on new PC. Dose anyone have any idea?
